product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsCamo Hydrating CC Cream SPF 30
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHSA/FSA eligiblee.l.f. Cosmetics' long-lasting, color-correcting Camo Hydrating CC Cream delivers the full coverage you crave while moisturizing skin for a smooth, glowy finish. It's infused with vitamin B5, plus tremella mushroom, hyaluronic acid, and broad-spectrum SPF 30 to help protect skin from the sun.
details: DetailsBenefitsFull coverage, color-correcting foundation hydrates skin for a dewy finishHelps plump skin's appearanceBroad-spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen helps protect skin from the sunGreat for dry, oily & combination skin100% vegan & cruelty-free; e.l.f. is Leaping Bunny CertifiedMade in a Fair-Trade Certified facilityKey IngredientsVitamin B5 helps to moisturize & nourish skinFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanHydroquinoneItem 2617540How To UsePrep skin with e.l.f.'s Power Grip Primer or your favorite e.l.f. primer (sold separately).Apply 1-2 pumps of the CC Cream to clean skin using the Complexion Duo Brush (sold separately) to achieve an airbrushed finish.Wear as a moisturizer or full-coverage foundation depending on your needs.Pro Tip: Apply to the areas that need the most color correcting first to help even the skin's tone.IngredientsActive Ingredients: Zinc Oxide 6.3%, Titanium Dioxide 6%, Homosalate 5%, Octisalate 4.5%, Octocrylene 3%.Inactive Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Panthenol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Acrylates/Polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Trehalose, Phenoxyethanol, Hydrated Silica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Aluminum Hydroxide, Triethyl Citrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Tin Oxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tremella Fuciformis Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Canola Oil, Glycerin, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Beta-Carotene, Soluble Collagen. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Red Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Black Iron Oxide (CI 77499).Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Prep skin with e.l.f.'s Power Grip Primer or your favorite e.l.f. primer (sold separately).Apply 1-2 pumps of the CC Cream to clean skin using the Complexion Duo Brush (sold separately) to achieve an airbrushed finish.Wear as a moisturizer or full-coverage foundation depending on your needs.Pro Tip: Apply to the areas that need the most color correcting first to help even the skin's tone.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Very smooth! I love the color 210 N! It's pretty tan and blends really nicely with a lighter concealer! I Will continue to buy this product as long as it's on the shelf it's my go to full coverage!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: This makeup settles in my wrinkles.  I need something for mature skin

reviews.headline: Best bang for the buck!
reviews.comments: Rivals the prestige brand and even surpasses some of their quality. Save your money. Get great results. Win-Win!

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: amazing quality, amazing formula, Spf is a must ðŸ˜‹

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: I enjoy the product especially cause it has SPF 30

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: good

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: The only thing I don't like about this product is that when you apply it is makes your face turn white, but you have to continue massaging in and it will blend perfectly

reviews.headline: Amazing product but NOT for acne prone skin
reviews.comments: I absolutely loved this product for the first 3 days. It looks amazing when applied with a makeup sponge. Definitely full coverage. But unfortunately it clogged every pore on my face and left me with a face full of acne.

reviews.headline: Very thick
reviews.comments: Very disappointed in the shade. It looked good in the store compared to the color of my wrist. Too orange on my face. It was very thick and heavy.

reviews.headline: Love Elf as a brand, but this was not it
reviews.comments: At first I loved the coverage, but throughout the day it gets oily and accentuated the pores, and was very patchy. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: This is very full coverage! A little goes a long way. It still looks skinlike and has good lasting power if set with powder. I love that it has a high SPF as well.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: This is very full coverage! A little goes a long way. It still looks skinlike and has good lasting power if set with powder. I love that it has a high SPF as well.

reviews.headline: Foundation is too thick
reviews.comments: This foundation is very thick and almost pancakie. It shows every line on your face. It is definitely not for anyone whose skin is maturing. I have to throw it away.

reviews.headline: I will buy again
reviews.comments: I love the feel of this makeup but I got the wrong color. So will be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Awesome product! Reminds me of IT Cosmetics
reviews.comments: I love this foundation! Super easy to shade match, excellent coverage with our getting "cakey". It reminds me of It Cosmetics Foundation but a fraction of the price. Love this product!

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: This has been the best CC cream I owned. It works fantastic and looks so natural.

reviews.headline: NOT moisturizing, color is off
reviews.comments: Way too drying, even though I moisturize well. I'd hate to experience the non-"hydrating" camo cream! Very tacky, not smooth. Lighter than the swatch indicated. I can work with it, but I'm disappointed.

reviews.headline: Great product bad package
reviews.comments: 4.5 stars! Love this product, best color match to my warm leaning neutral light skin tone! Love that it is sheer enough to have my freckles pop through and wears well. The only downside is the pump-its not great and is unnecessarily messy.

reviews.headline: Shows every pore :(
reviews.comments: Was disappointed did not apply well even with the elf primer. Looked terrible the minute I put it on.

reviews.headline: Dry and cakey
reviews.comments: Great coverage but NOT hydrating or dewy at ALL. It was thick and super cakey so it clung to all my dry patches :( I was so disappointed

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have tried the regular CC cream, and it was a bit too dry for me. I did not like the look. Yes it does work for a lot of people, just not this one. I am 63, with normal skin no dry patches, or oily areas, no acne either. I do have fine smile lines that are getting deeper as I age. And thats okay, part of life. I purchased shade 205 N, it's perfect. I have a fair-light neutral undertone. I use Holy Hydration products, plus Loreal age perfect serum for a primer, plus Whoa Glow in Sunbeam   and Loreal Glotion in fair. Hali glow did not go light enough or pink enough, but I have not tried 0.0 or 0.5 either.
For reference I love Revlon Illuminance in 117, Wet n Wild in Nude Ivory, Loreal True Match Lumi N 1-2. I set my under eyes and chin with Halo Glow powder in light pink. Then set with Elf dewy coconut setting spray. It last at least 10 hours. Thank you Elf
faceoff_positive.headline: Yes, yes love this CC cream.

faceoff_negative.comments: Be careful when purchasing as I purchased right when it came out and the swatches for fair/light skin were mixed and I actually ordered a little too dark but they have since corrected and were incredibly helpful with the small mistake. I felt the foundation and it has a nice texture, hope it works on my dry skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Check swatches
